attributes.action: Give the Police the right to-
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fine cyclist £50 for riding two or more a breast on public roads,they pay no road tax etc, and cause large delays to the motorist. And if they persist, the police should be allowed to take the offenders bikes away from them and crush them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
